attributes.action: ALLOW UK CITIZENS TO HAVE A REFERENDUM ON DIGITAL ID CARDS
attributes.background: Here in the UK we are proud to be a democratic country, which gives us the right to debate and have a say on how our country is Governed by a non dictatorial Government. It is only fair that the general public decide on the future of digital ID cards via a referendum.

rejection.details:
Hold a referendum on introducing mandatory identity cards in the UK
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/734246
